title: Card With Image Cutout
description: In this lab, we will explore CSS programming by creating a card with an image cutout effect. This lab aims to help you understand how to use pseudo-elements and CSS properties to create visually appealing designs. By the end of this lab, you will have learned how to create a card layout that looks modern and professional.
